body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Alan Foster and the customer's name is Diana Robinson.  The conversation is about a random business (a Marketing Agency ) and is a conversation about product quality.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for calling Bright Marketing Agency! My name is Alan Foster. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, Alan. I'm Diana Robinson. I'm having some concerns about the quality of the marketing materials I received.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Diana! I'm sorry to hear that you're feeling this way. Could you please tell me a bit more about the issue you're facing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, the brochures came in with several grammatical errors and the colors look different from what I expected.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand your frustration. We strive for high-quality products. Can I ask you for your order number to look up the details?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you! And could you also please provide your email address so I can send you updates?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is diana.robinson@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, Diana. I will look into this issue immediately and ensure it gets resolved. Thank you for your patience.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I appreciate that, Alan. I hope it can be resolved soon.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Absolutely! I will keep you updated. Thank you for your time today, Diana, and for bringing this to our attention. Have a great day!
